subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Dario Franchitti, returning to the IndyCar Series this season after spending 2008 trying to transition to Nascar, won the Toyota Grand Prix of Long Beach in California. Franchitti dominated the 85-lap event on the temporary street circuit, finishing far ahead of the runner-up Will Power, the pole winner. It is his ninth IndyCar win and first since the 2008 season finale at Chicagoland.
